name: MoonDigger
description:
Strange vibrations are seen on the moon! The brave cosmonaut Ivan dresses his suit and goes straight to the moon on a scientific expedition to find out the cause of the vibrations on the moon.
Use explosives and extract resources to improve your equipment.
Meet the lunar simulator with interesting features. The gameplay is simple, but at the same time it is fascinating and will appeal to both adults and children.


Features:
-Beautiful graphics
-Interesting levels
-Won't get bored of the game
-Representative of the platformers which will help you pass a couple of evenings
